sentences.en: a group of rabid right-wing fanatics
sentences.cn: 一群极端的右翼狂热分子

sentences.en: A rabid dog may froth at the mouth.
sentences.cn: 疯狗可能嘴边流着白沫.

sentences.en: A rabid dog that Became the terror of the neighBorhood.
sentences.cn: 一条狂暴的狗给邻居们带来极大的恐怖.

sentences.en: Black Sea of red crystal, Highborne relics, corruption bears a strange, rabid thistle bears 1, 2.
sentences.cn: 黑海岸的红色水晶, 上层精灵的遗物, 堕落的熊怪1, 狂暴蓟熊1 、 2.

sentences.en: Even the survey's most rabid critics acknowledge the utility of this kind of data.
sentences.cn: 连该调查最狂热的批评者也承认这类数据的用处.

sentences.en: In cattle, rabies is transmitted exclusively from the bite of salivs infected rabid animals.
sentences.cn: 在牛, 狂犬病仅能由患狂犬病动物通过唾液的咬伤而传播.

sentences.en: Only the heel and rabid younger officers wanted to continue, and even they were heartsick.
sentences.cn: 只有一部分骄横不可一世的少壮军官想要继续打下去, 但是就连这些人也不免气馁了.

sentences.en: Rex made a rabid speech in the House of Commons.
sentences.cn: 雷克斯在下院发表了一通狂热的演说.

sentences.en: That breakout has cleaned out stops placed by bulls and sucked the most rabid bears shorted.
sentences.cn: 这个突破把多头的止损都清光了,还把激进的空头吸进来了.

sentences.en: The customs agents destroyed the dog that was found to be rabid.
sentences.cn: 海关消灭了被发现患有狂犬病的狗.

sentences.en: This time it was to avoid a pack of rabid humans racing toward the truck.
sentences.cn: 这次转弯是为躲开一群狂暴地冲卡车跑来的人.

sentences.en: Toronto Raptors ( 770.40 ) - Even the rabid Toronto fans would agree that the Raptors have severely underachieved.
sentences.cn: 多伦多猛龙队 ( 770.40 ) — 即使是疯癫的多伦多球迷也会承认猛龙的确是远远达不到及格线.

sentences.en: Who would you say are more rabid, UT fans or Nebraska fans?
sentences.cn: 你觉得谁更疯狂, UT球迷还是内布拉斯的球迷?

sentences.en: You will be in charge of a band of rabid mutant fiddle players.
sentences.cn: 你要对一群狂暴的、变异的、无聊的玩家负责.

words.tran_cn: 激烈的；狂暴的；偏激的；患狂犬病的

trans.tran_cn: 患狂犬病的， 疯狂的，狂暴的， 狂热的
trans.tran_en: having very extreme and unreasonable opinions
